snippet: Officials said only minor disruptions had resulted from what a loose international coalition of pro-Palestinian groups threatened would be “a massive cyberassault” against Israel.
abstract: Israeli officials says loose international coalition of pro-Palestinian computer hackers threatened to carry out huge cyberattack against Israel, but that campaign created mostly minor disruptions.
lead_paragraph: Officials said only minor disruptions had resulted from what a loose international coalition of pro-Palestinian groups threatened would be “a massive cyberassault” against Israel.

headline.main: Israel Says It Repelled Most Attacks on Its Web Sites by Pro-Palestinian Hackers
headline.print_headline: Israel Says It Repelled Most Attacks on Its Web Sites by Pro-Palestinian Hackers
